entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 28.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening then periods of light snow and blowing snow. Wind north 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
